Synopsis:
Follow the footsteps of the world's first modern family during the trip of a lifetime. When the cave that has always been his home is destroyed-like the rest of the world shortly after-the Croods are forced to undertake the first family road trip (or rather path). Shaken by generational clashes and earthquakes, the Croods discover an amazing new world, full of fantastic creatures, and a future that exceeds what they had imagined.
